statements: SELECT * FROM gene_annotations WHERE gene_id = 1;
SELECT gene_name, classification FROM gene_annotations WHERE go_id = 'GO1234';
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, go_term FROM gene_annotations WHERE classification = 'Function';
SELECT classification, go_id, go_term FROM gene_annotations ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM gene_annotations WHERE go_term LIKE '%metabolism%';
SELECT * FROM gene_annotations WHERE classification = 'Protein'
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, go_id, go_term FROM gene_annotations ORDER BY gene_id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT classification FROM gene_annotations
SELECT gene_name, go_id, go_term FROM gene_annotations WHERE go_id LIKE 'GO:%' AND classification = 'Gene'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS gene_count, classification FROM gene_annotations GROUP BY classification HAVING gene_count > 5
SELECT * FROM GeneAnnotations
SELECT gene_name, go_term FROM GeneAnnotations
SELECT gene_name, go_term FROM GeneAnnotations WHERE gene_id = 1
SELECT * FROM GeneClassification
SELECT gene_id, functional_category FROM GeneClassification
SELECT gene_name FROM GeneAnnotations WHERE gene_id = 1;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name FROM GeneAnnotations WHERE go_term = 'GO1';
SELECT * FROM GeneClassification WHERE classification_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY classification_id DESC;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, functional_category FROM GeneAnnotations JOIN GeneClassification ON GeneAnnotations.gene_id = GeneClassification.gene_id;
SELECT * FROM GeneClassification WHERE functional_category LIKE 'Protein%' ORDER BY gene_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM gene_annotations WHERE gene_id = 1;
SELECT gene_id, gene_symbol, go_term_name FROM gene_annotations WHERE go_term_id = 'GO:000001';
SELECT gene_symbol, go_term_id FROM gene_annotations WHERE gene_id = 2;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome_id FROM gene_information WHERE gene_id = 10;
SELECT gene_id, functional_category FROM gene_classification WHERE classification_type = 'Type A';
SELECT * FROM gene_annotations JOIN gene_classification ON gene_annotations.gene_id = gene_classification.gene_id WHERE gene_annotations.gene_id = 1;
SELECT gene_id, gene_symbol, gene_name FROM gene_annotations NATURAL JOIN gene_information WHERE gene_annotations.go_term_id = 'GO:000001';

SELECT gene_id, gene_name, gene_length, functional_category FROM gene_information JOIN gene_classification ON gene_information.gene_id = gene_classification.gene_id WHERE gene_length > 1000 ORDER BY gene_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM gene_information WHERE chromosome_id IN ('chr1', 'chr2', 'chr3') AND gene_length BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT gene_id, gene_symbol, go_term_name, classification_type FROM gene_annotations NATURAL JOIN gene_classification WHERE gene_classification.functional_category = 'Metabolism';
SELECT gene_id, annotation FROM gene_annotations;
SELECT classification, gene_id FROM gene_classification ORDER BY classification DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT term_name, description FROM go_terms;
SELECT annotation FROM gene_annotations WHERE gene_id = 1;
SELECT classification, term_name FROM gene_classification JOIN go_terms ON gene_classification.gene_id = go_terms.term_id;
SELECT classification, gene_id FROM gene_classification ORDER BY gene_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT gene_id, annotation FROM gene_annotations WHERE gene_id = 5;
SELECT gene_id, term_name, description FROM gene_go_mapping JOIN go_terms ON gene_go_mapping.term_id = go_terms.term_id ORDER BY gene_go_mapping.gene_id ASC, go_terms.term_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT annotation, classification FROM gene_annotations JOIN gene_classification ON gene_annotations.gene_id = gene_classification.gene_id WHERE classification = 'Protein';
SELECT term_name, gene_id FROM go_terms JOIN gene_go_mapping ON go_terms.term_id = gene_go_mapping.term_id WHERE gene_go_mapping.gene_id IN (1, 3, 4);
SELECT * FROM GeneAnnotations;
SELECT gene_name, go_term_name FROM GeneAnnotations WHERE gene_id = 1;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name FROM GeneAnnotations ORDER BY gene_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT go_term_id FROM GeneAnnotations;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, go_term_name FROM GeneAnnotations WHERE go_term_id = 'GO:0008150';
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, go_term_name FROM GeneAnnotations LIMIT 10;
SELECT gene_name, gene_id, go_term_id FROM GeneAnnotations WHERE gene_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY gene_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM FunctionalClassification WHERE classification_name IN ('Class1', 'Class2', 'Class3') AND classification_id > 5;

SELECT GeneAnnotations.gene_name, FunctionalClassification.classification_name FROM GeneFunctionalClassification JOIN GeneAnnotations ON GeneFunctionalClassification.gene_id = GeneAnnotations.gene_id JOIN FunctionalClassification ON GeneFunctionalClassification.classification_id = FunctionalClassification.classification_id;
SELECT gene_id, gene_symbol, gene_description FROM GeneInformation WHERE gene_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY gene_id ASC;
